 Boolean variable to indicate whether the best path should be displayed (in animation) or not.

 The total reward accumulated by the best path.

 Current index in the best path animation, i.e., which configuration of the best path should be currently displayed.
int m_bestPathCurrReward
 Reward accumulated by the best path from beginning until (and including) the current index.
std::vector< int > m_bestPathCurrRemainingRewards
 Reward regions that have not yet been reached by the best path from beginning until (and including) the current index.

The total reward accumulated by the best path.

Current index in the best path animation, i.e., which configuration of the best path should be currently displayed.

Reward accumulated by the best path from beginning until (and including) the current index.
